Detailed Description

This class implements the draw item used by visuals.

void Moo::VisualDrawItem::init ( VertexSnapshotPtr  pVSS,
PrimitivePtr  pPrimitives,
SmartPointer< StateRecorder >  pStateRecorder,
uint32  primitiveGroup,
float  distance,
StaticVertexColoursPtr  pStaticVertexColours = NULL,
bool  sortInternal = false 
)

This method inits the visual draw item.

Parameters:
pVSS VertextSnapshot containing the vertices to use for drawing.
pPrimitives the primitives
pStateRecorder the recorded states
primitiveGroup the primitive group index
distance the distance at which to sort this draw item
pStaticVertexColours the static vertex colours for this draw item.
sortInternal wheter or not to sort this draw items triangles agains each other
